dyslexia.title: Install a bookmarklet
dyslexia.directions: Turn it on before browsing the web.
dyslexia.example: This prompt helps you understand what it’s like to have a a cognitive disability condition like Dyslexia.

dominant-hand.title: Sit on your dominant hand
dominant-hand.directions: You'll have to rely on your non-dominant hand.
dominant-hand.example: This prompt helps you understand what it’s like to have a a cognitive disability condition like Dyslexia.

loud-coffee-shop.title: Go to a loud coffee shop

screen-reader.title: Close your eyes and use a screen reader

unplug-mouse.title: Unplug your mouse
unplug-mouse.directions: Navigate your computer using the keyboard. Using the trackpad is cheating!
unplug-mouse.example: This prompt helps you understand what it’s like to have a a motor disability condition like Parkinson’s.

wake-up-early.title: Wake up early
wake-up-early.directions: Set an alarm for 3:10 AM and immediately try to book a flight for that vacation you've been dreaming about.

wear-mittens.title: Wear mittens
wear-mittens.directions: Use your computer while wearing cozy winter gear.

zoom-out.title: Zoom out
zoom-out.directions: Use the text resize controls on your browser to make the text very small.
zoom-out.example: This prompt helps you understand what it’s like to have a a motor disability condition like Parkinson’s.
